Sep 19

Pre-Conference Drinks

20:00 • The Trafalgar Brewing Company Shop 10, 1/F, Causeway Centre, 28 Harbour Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

Hosted by Bitcoin Association of Hong Kong • RSVP • Get Directions

Pre-Conference Drinks

Bitkan is bringing the 2017 Blockchain Global Summit to Hong Kong from September 20 to 21.

We are welcoming all attendees and the Hong Kong Bitcoin community to pre-conference drinks the evening before in Wan Chai.

Attending this meetup is free.

Tickets for the conference can be booked directly through Bitkan or at Huodongxing.

You can use the code bitcoinhk5 to get 50% off your Privilege Ticket and code bitcoinhk7 to get 30% off the VIP ticket.

Keep in touch

Fostering and promoting Bitcoin and its technology in Hong Kong.
